messages.title: Labour have lost it in Calder Valley
It doesn't have to be the Conservatives' turn
messages.content: We know their record in Calderdale. Do we really want them running the country?

mentions.tacticalSituation: On Calderdale MBC in this constituency: Conservatives: 12 councillors, Liberal Democrats: 11 councillors, Independent: 3 councillors, English Democrats: 1 councillor, Labour: 0 councillors in Calder Valley.

issues.governance: The Calderdale council officials repeatedly went against contract bidding rules, could cost taxpayers £6 million. Critics today described it as a fiasco, putting a huge question mark over the council’s leadership.
issues.health: Children’s Services in Calderdale have been criticised as ‘inadequate’ by an Ofsted report [that] found a series of problems which had left some young people 'at risk of significant harm' over a period of years.

quotes.text: The Calderdale council shambles, in which council officials repeatedly went against contract bidding rules, could cost taxpayers £6 million. Critics today described it as a fiasco, putting a huge question mark over the council’s leadership.

Children’s Services in Calderdale have been criticised as ‘inadequate’ by an Ofsted report [that] found a series of problems which had left some young people 'at risk of significant harm' over a period of years.
